hero.title: Iziko Lakho Lokulawula Imithombo Yoluntu
hero.subtitle: Yenza umxholo omangalisayo ngeelwimi ezisemthethweni ezili-11. Yakhiwe ngabaseMzansi, yabaseMzansi.

features.title: Yenzelwe iMzansi
features.subtitle: I-Purple Glow ayiguqulelwanga nje—iyaqonda inkcubeko. Ukusuka kwislang yaselokishini ukuya kwisiAfrikaans seshishini.

aiEngine.title: Injini Yomxholo we-AI
aiEngine.description: I-Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 inika amandla izithuba zakho. Yenza umbhalo, imifanekiso, nevidiyo ehambelana nabaphulaphuli baseMzansi.

multilingual.title: Iilwimi Ezili-11, Iqonga Elinye
multilingual.description: Thumela ngesiXhosa kusasa, ngesiAfrikaans emini, ngesiNgesi ngokuhlwa. Tshintsha iilwimi phakathi kwesivakalisi.

scheduling.title: Ucwangciso Oluhlakaniphile
scheduling.description: I-AI ifunda amaxesha alungileyo okuthumela kubaphulaphuli bakho. Cwangcisa umxholo wenyanga yonke kwimizuzu eli-10.

step1.title: Chaza I-Vibe Yakho
step1.description: Xelela i-Purple Glow ukuba uthengisa okanye ukhuthaza ntoni. Khetha ithoni yakho: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, okanye Cyberpunk.

step2.title: I-AI Yenza Umxholo
step2.description: Injini yethu enikwe amandla yi-Gemini yenza izithuba ezilungiselelwe iqonga ngemifanekiso ngemizuzwana.

step3.title: Cwangcisa & Thumela
step3.description: Hlola, hlela, okanye ucwangcise. I-Purple Glow iphethe okuseleyo—iphinde icebise amaxesha athumela kakuhle.

thabo.quote: I-Purple Glow indincede ndikhule ukusuka kuma-500 ukuya kwi-5,000 abalandeli kwiinyanga ezi-3. Umxholo wesiXhosa ubetha ngendlela eyahlukileyo.
thabo.name: Thabo M.

zanele.quote: Ndikwazi ukuthumela ngeelwimi zonke ezili-11 ngaphandle kokuqesha umguquleli. Yinto eguqula umdlalo kumashishini aselokishini.
zanele.name: Zanele K.

pieter.quote: I-AI iqonda izaci zesiAfrikaans ngcono kunethimba lam lokuthengisa. Ons is baie impressed.
pieter.name: Pieter v.d.M.

pricing.title: Amaxabiso Acace. Akukho Mfihlo.
pricing.subtitle: Qala simahla. Khula njengoko ukhula. Rhoxisa nangaliphi na ixesha.

credits.title: Ufuna amandla ongezelelweyo?
credits.subtitle: Ziincinci iikhredithi zemifanekiso okanye zevidiyo? Gcwalisa ngokukhawuleza ngaphandle kokutshintsha ubhaliso lwakho.
